messages.subject: Super Mario
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, most of you might not know German, but you will probably see from the pictures what it is about: My 4-year-old son had the idea to copy the Super Mario
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

most of you might not know German, but you will probably see from the pictures what it is about: My 4-year-old son had the idea to copy the Super Mario game he's interested in into our house. This is what it can look like to find ways how to convert TV, PC-games into real life (besides books, outings, etc. that match the subject of interest).

I thought it might interest you - we loved watching him playing all day, asking for things that I would cut out for him.

Greetings from Germany
Johanna



--
(Mit zwei Söhnen (4 & 1) und Tochter (10))

-------------------------------------------------
Geflüstert wird nicht! - UNERZOGEN
www.unerzogen-magazin.de
-------------------------------------------------
